name: Alex Lombardi
content: Alex Lombardi CS Skip to main content Alex Lombardi Assistant Professor Contact Building 312 Computer Science Envelope al2201@cs.princeton.edu Phone (609) 258-9525 Diploma Ph.D., Massachusetts Institute of Technology, 2022 Research Areas Theory Short Bio Academic home page.Lombardi joined the Princeton faculty in September 2023. Prior to that, he was a Simons-Berkeley postdoctoral fellow. He received his PhD in computer science at MIT.His current interests lie mainly in the theory and foundations of cryptography (classical and quantum) and he is broadly interested in theoretical computer science.
